cast.overview: During WWII, a teenage boy discovering himself becomes love-stricken by Malèna, a sensual woman living in a small, narrow-minded Italian town.
cast.title: Malena

details.biography:
Alessandro Cremona (born 1969) is an Italian actor best known in English language cinema for his role of the henchman Marco Sciarra in the James Bond film, Spectre (2015).

He was born in Busto Arsizio in the province of Varese. His family were originally from Piazza Armerina, in the province of Enna, in Sicily.

Description above from the Wikipedia article Alessandro Cremona, licensed under CC-BY-SA, full list of contributors on Wikipedia.
details.name: Alessandro Cremona
